definition: range of jurisdiction or influence, cover (the ground) with a surface layer of grass or grass roots
details:
noun
- range of jurisdiction or influence
= example: range of jurisdiction or influence
- the territory claimed by a juvenile gang as its own
- surface layer of ground containing a mat of grass and grass roots
= synonyms: sod, sward, greensward
verb
- cover (the ground) with a surface layer of grass or grass roots
